About Me

I really enjoy using my interest in development to build a satisfying career. I love learning, coming up with new ideas, and improving my skills in open-source work. This website displays the projects I've worked on and the skills I've developed, with the goal of making software that's both efficient and looks good, providing users with a smooth experience.

I focus on both front-end and back-end development, customizing solutions to fit each project's specific needs. Whether you're a client, a fellow developer, or just curious, take a look at my portfolio and reach out if you'd like to collaborate. Thanks for stopping by, and let's make some amazing digital experiences together!

GitHub Snake Contributions

Start a year-long adventure of coding with my journey on GitHub. I'm fully committed, contributing 95% of the time every day. From early morning to late at night, see how my code improves and changes. Each time I save my work (commit), it shows how I'm being innovative and making progress. Let's embrace the flexibility and strength represented by the snake. It's not just about making commits, but it's an invitation for us to code together. ðŸš€

Problem Solving activity

In the always changing world of technology, being good at fixing problems is really important. I make sure to improve myself all the time, so I work on a puzzle from LeetCode every day. This helps me get better at thinking in ways that solve problems and also keeps me up to date with the newest ways of writing code and the best methods to use.
